thread.section_title: The Z Hotel Piccadilly - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location
thread.title_full: Good location - Review of The Z Hotel Piccadilly, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: FruFlisnes
title: Good location
text:
Very good location with walking distance to good restaurants, theatre district and shopping. Small, but excellent service. Plus for the free wine and cheese in the afternoons, and the clean and modern rooms. The breakfast as I dismissed beforehand as more of a supermarket type ready-packed was actually very good and fresh, although not continental.
The rooms were a little bit on the small side for my taste, but other than that this place is perfect in London!
